original_title: Magic Mike XXXL: A Hardcore Parody
overview: Award-Winning Director Brad Armstrong brings you a “Ladies Night” to remember! Magic Mike, Dallas, and the rest of the boys are getting the women all Hot, Horny, and very much willing to please. Girls, we know you've been waiting for this one! And guys, don’t worry... there’s plenty of gorgeous women in here to make you happy too! So, tonight, do yourself a favor: Let her pick the movie!
title: Magic Mike XXXL: A Hardcore Parody
